message.content:
cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the application of computer vision and pattern recognition techniques to automate the task of lip reading. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves signal processing, which falls under cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing). The proposed approach involves natural language processing, which is a sub-field of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves multimedia analysis, which falls under cs.MM (Multimedia). Finally, the paper proposes a novel approach, which involves machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) a likely sub-category as well.
